channel.title: HELP! Shipping to Portugal (European Union)?
channel.description:
Hello,
I wanted to purchase an Axoloti Core, but can't choose Portugal from the list. Portugal is in EU. Any reason why it is not an option?
Is there some way to ship it to Portugal?
Thank you!

item.title: HELP! Shipping to Portugal (European Union)?
item.dc:creator: @chico
item.description:
@chico wrote:

It's out of stock, again... Portugal wasn't even on the shipping list, probably has nothing to do with Covid. Spain and Italy are there. Portugal is accepting mail. I don't understand.

Anyway, stay safe. Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! Shipping to Portugal (European Union)?
item.dc:creator: @s8jfou
item.description:
@s8jfou wrote:

You should check on this forum frequently. Sometimes people are selling their own axo's.
Normally you can order an axoloti everywhere in the world. But this is only due to Covid19, wolrdwide shiping is prohibited for now, we don't know for how many weeks or months yet...

And for shiping to Portugal, it's strange... I've ordered one for France today and it worked for me. I think it's not the best moment to order anything in fact. It will be easier after all that shit.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! Shipping to Portugal (European Union)?
item.dc:creator: @Werdnacker
item.description:
@Werdnacker wrote:

I know it’s difficult times but any possible to way to get one over to usa? still haven’t gotten my hands on a single axoloti yet my heart just broke seeing no shipping outside of EU.

Read full topic
